feedback.ifYouMeantThis: Agar tumne yahi answer socha tha, toh yeh misconceptions ho sakti hain:

coachNotes.title: Coach Notes
coachNotes.noNotesYet: Abhi koi coach notes nahi hain!
coachNotes.writeExplanations: Practice karte waqt apni thinking likho taaki personalized tips mil sakein.

dashboard.viewAnalytics: Detailed analytics, coach notes, aur focus mode performance dekho.
dashboard.noFocusData: Abhi koi Focus Mode data nahi hai! Practice karte waqt Focus Mode enable karo apni speed aur accuracy track karne ke liye.

learn.startWithLesson: Pehle lesson padho, phir practice karke master bano.
learn.applyWhatYouLearned: Jo seekha hai usse interactive problems mein use karo!

fractions.title: Fractions
fractions.description: Fractions ki addition, subtraction aur equivalent fractions confidently karo.
fractions.bigIdea: Ek fraction batata hai ki poore mein se humne kitne equal parts liye hain. Upar = numerator (kitne parts). Neeche = denominator (poora kitne equal parts mein bata hai).
keyTakeaways: Fractions add ya subtract karne se pehle common denominator dhundho.
Sirf numerators ko add/subtract karoâ€”denominator same rehta hai.
Final answer ko simplify karo agar ho sake.

negatives.title: Negative Numbers
negatives.description: Negatives ke saath addition, subtraction aur multiplication master karo.
negatives.bigIdea: Negative numbers zero se chhote numbers hain. Number line ko ek road ki tarah socho. Add karna right move hai, subtract karna left move hai.
keyTakeaways: Negative add karna matlab positive subtract karna.
Negative subtract karna matlab positive add karna.
Number line use karo visualize karne ke liye ki kahan pahunchte ho.

linear-equations.title: Linear Equations
linear-equations.description: One-step aur two-step equations pro ki tarah solve karo.
linear-equations.bigIdea: Equation ek balance scale ki tarah hai. Ek side pe jo karo, doosri side pe bhi wahi karna padega balance rakhne ke liye.
keyTakeaways: Ek side pe jo karo, doosri side pe bhi karo.
Pehle addition/subtraction undo karo, phir multiplication/division.
Answer check karo wapas equation mein daalke.

mixed-review.title: Mixed Review
mixed-review.description: Saare topics saath mein practice karo apni skills strong karne ke liye.
mixed-review.bigIdea: Seekha hua consolidate karne ka sabse accha tarika hai different topics ke problems random order mein practice karna.
keyTakeaways: Solve karne se pehle problem type identify karo.
Us topic ke liye specific strategy use karo.
Regular mixed practice lasting skills build karti hai.

errors.connectionError: Internet connection check karo ya phir try karo.
errors.evaluationError: Answer evaluate karte waqt error hua
